title: Charred leeks with girolles and leek mayonnaise
description: Oil infused with charred leeks is used to make a mayonnaise and served with fried mushrooms, grilled leeks and croûtons.
ingredients: vegetable oil or butter, for frying
vinaigrette (made from 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp white wine vinegar and 1 tsp Dijon mustard mixed together)
few sprigs chives, green tops only
